## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Racerx323/homelab-server-configs/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code

- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally with my changes
